segments.en: “Mendicants, I will teach you seven principles that prevent decline.

segments.pli: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha … pe …
katame ca, bhikkhave, satta aparihāniyā dhammā?
segments.en: And what are the seven principles that prevent decline?

segments.pli: Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhū na kammārāmā bhavissanti, na kammaratā, na kammārāmataṃ anuyuttā; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
segments.en: As long as the mendicants don’t relish work, loving it and liking to relish it, they can expect growth, not decline.

segments.pli: Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhū na bhassārāmā bhavissanti … pe …
segments.en: As long as they don’t enjoy talk …

segments.pli: na pāpicchā bhavissanti na pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gatā …
segments.en: they don’t have wicked desires, falling under the sway of wicked desires …

segments.pli: na pāpamittā bhavissanti na pāpasahāyā na pāpasampavaṅkā …
segments.en: they don’t have bad friends, companions, and associates …

segments.pli: na oramattakena visesādhigamena antarāvosānaṃ āpajjissanti; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
segments.en: they don’t stop half-way after achieving some insignificant distinction, they can expect growth, not decline.

segments.pli: Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, ime satta aparihāniyā dhammā bhikkhūsu ṭhassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihāniyesu dhammesu bhikkhū sandississanti; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihānī”ti.
segments.en: As long as these seven principles that prevent decline last among the mendicants, and as long as the mendicants are seen following them, they can expect growth, not decline.”
